meanings.sent1: The graven image of a lion on the stone wall looked so realistic.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a graven technique to create intricate patterns on the wooden door.
meanings.sent3: The graven figure of a bear seemed to come alive and dance in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: Her graven features captured the essence of beauty frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The graven details on the ancient statue told a story of forgotten times.

meanings.sent1: The graven initials on the tree trunk marked their everlasting love.
meanings.sent2: The graven message on the ring held sentimental value for the wearer.
meanings.sent3: The graven words on the tombstone seemed to whisper secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent4: His graven name on the trophy symbolized his hard-earned victory.
meanings.sent5: The graven symbols on the ancient tablet revealed a hidden language of the past.
